name: Sorcerer Scrimmage
description:
Introduction

Welcome to Sorcerer Scrimmage! The contest that definitively decides which wizard has the superior beard.

Sorcerer Scrimmage is a local multiplayer game for 2-4 players. (Note: A gamepad/controller is required to play!)

The first wizard to 10 POINTS wins the game!

Controls  - Jump / Double Jump - Shoot Fireball

 - Use Potion (In Game) / Enable Minimal Menu (Menu Only)

- Join / Ready (Menu Only)

Enter - Pause

Start - Join Mid-Game

Select - Leave Mid-Game

Potions

Potions will spawn randomly across the stage every few seconds. Each potion has a different effect.

Red Potion - Upon use, your wizard will summon a small, rotating, heart above their head. The heart will negate 1 damage before disappearing. (Red potions do not stack. If used while you already have a heart summon, the potion will be consumed with no effect)

Pink Potion - Upon use, your wizard will fire a fast, pink bolt, which travels through walls.

Blue Potion - Upon use, your wizard will fire an ice bolt that can freeze another wizard in a block of ice. Frozen wizards can be pushed, and ice can be broken by firing at it.

Green Potion - Upon use, your wizard will throw the green potion in an arc. Upon contact with any surface, the potion will break and release a cloud of poisonous gas that deals damage upon contact. If the potion breaks on a player, it will deal an additional 1 damage.

Yellow Potion - Upon use, your wizard will fire a slow moving, electric orb. The orb will fire projectiles downward, and can be destroyed if it is shot. The orb itself deals 1 damage.

Black Potion - The black potion is EXTREMELY RARE, and has a 16% chance of appearing if it spawns directly on top of a wizard. Upon use, your wizard will fire an extremely slow vortex, which travels through walls, and consumes all projectiles that collide with it.
